sn4.1:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava uruvelayam viharati najja neranjaraya tire ajapalanigrodhamule pathamabhisambuddho.
sn4.1:1.3: Atha kho bhagavato rahogatassa patisallinassa evam cetaso parivitakko udapadi:
sn4.1:1.5: Sadhu mutto vatamhi taya anatthasamhitaya dukkarakarikaya.
sn4.1:2.1: Atha kho maro papima bhagavato cetasa cetoparivitakkamannaya yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam gathaya ajjhabhasi:
sn4.1:4.1: Atha kho bhagava “maro ayam papima” iti viditva maram papimantam gathahi ajjhabhasi:
sn4.1:7.1: Atha kho maro papima “janati mam bhagava, janati mam sugato”ti, dukkhi dummano tatthevantaradhayiti.
